==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Khemenu''|egy=ḫmnw}} is the Egyptian name for the city of {{w|Hermopolis}}. It means "Eight-Town", after the Ogdoad, a group of eight "primordial" deities whose cult was situated there.
